replies.body:
A win for United is a win for the team!  We're all in this together; no houses divided.  Your Council directed us, your Faceless kept them on their toes, and your Warband won us the deciding teamfight.  You're all fantastic!  WE are all fantastic.  In the spirit of United, congratulations to everyone who participated and played for the win.  It was ultimately a team effort.  
**UNITED WE STAND**
Hooah! UNITED WE STAND!!!
Oorah
Oprah!
Hooah

[](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/yugioh/images/d/d1/UnitedWeStand-YS18-EN-C-1E.png/revision/latest?cb=20180712165009)

United We Stand!
This comment right here is what I came to say. Well put!

COUNCIL MY BROTHERS!
We have risen from the bottom and made it to 2nd place.
We may have not won the battle but may you all win the war and rise out your various Elo hells!
Congratulations Council!  You fought excellently.
2nd place was all part of the plan. We sent the message that we can climb from dead last when everyone else thought we failed. We are playing 4D Chess while they are playing Tic-Tac-Toe.
This is obviously golf scoring system. Way to go Faceless.
WE KANGZ NAO

WARBAND BOYS WE FAILED THIS ONE SO YOU KNOW WHAT THAT MEANS
WE RUN DOWN MID BOYS {{sticker:draven-pose}}
DAMN STRAIGHT{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
Points
Wow thanks
i agree this whole event lacked details and an actual scoring system. it was here are teams play and oh someone won??? common riot
Something like the average number of missions completed per house iirc.
I agree. The scoring system was not transparent at all.
Good thing we don't have a face to show coming in last
HA and all my friends saying United was the "bad house"
IM CALLING IT, THIS IS ALL RIGGED
if i had that power, faceless woulda won

Faceless may be last but we have never had the spotlight in the first place. We live in the shadows and manipulate things behind the scenes. Needless to say this is far from the end of us{{item:4202}}
Faceless isn't interested in playing this game how you wanted us to.

Well, we were close. 

Them Dang Hero's Ruined our Scheme to Seize total omnipotence. Long Live the Council, May this event return Next year so that we may Continue our plans.

United We Stood. 
United We Prevailed.
UNITED WE STAND.
Loved the houses idea!!! Let's do more with it. Congrats United! Well done Council, we almost had it.

The "narrative" for the longest time, has been, in the beginning, win lane win game. Followed by "I carry my trash teammates/I am the team". This is prevalent in many games with taxing, stealing camps, stealing kills, and so on. 


However this is far from the truth in solo queue(once you can consistently climb most tiers). It's no coincidence that the majority of higher tier players recognize that it is a team game, that they aren't the baddest ones out there, and that the only way to climb is through humility and understanding that there is always room for growth.

That is the ideal mindset.

It is also no coincidence that the players with the "1v9" mindset, biggest ego problems, or are hardstuck are often times plat/high gold. Ofcourse some players can climb higher with such a flawed mentality, but it's an idealism that never criticizes itself. Players with the god complex often plateau in skill.

*edit* also the "narrative" is set by the players/community. In an ideal or perfect world (one where everyone has a player-growth oriented mindset) Council/United would win/tie/or be close. And the other two are dead last. So in that sense, things went how they should have.
HECK YES! Made my entire league server join House United, and we won, credits to my girlfriend for suggesting to join the United!

Good job comrades!

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
All the comments about how surprised they are about how council came back. Lmaoooo GO COUNCIL
LETS GOOO TEAM UNITED WE FOUGHT STRONG (maybe gave up the lead in week 2) BUT STAYED VIGILANT AND GOT THE COMEBACK
Riot, you should let us buy spawn animations so we can have them permanently. Players get to feel cool and Riot makes money. Everyone wins.

I don't understand how this was scored. In the future, Riot, please make a special queue in which the different houses can all face off. That would really be a cool way to face off and earn the title, rather than just getting points for missions.

What would a council vs warband draft game look like? I'd like to see that.

United We Stand,
Divided We Fall.
Fight Together
Till the Very End.
We needed just one more week at the Council to get 1st
USA! USA! US....wait what are we doing again?
UNITED WE STAND!
HELL YEAH

Imagine creating an event in which you play for your teams house in a team based game, but not expecting the house dedicated to teamwork to win.


YOU SILLY RIFF RAF NEVER STOOD A CHANCE

Ggwp to everyone who participated though! A grand challenge indeed.
